name: Terrestrial Tardigrades
description:
What is the most resilient life form known to man? The tiny tardigrade of course! It can survive without oxygen, isn't affected by gamma radiation, and can even live up to ten years without food or water! Many have speculated that when extraterrestrial life is discovered, a tardigrade may turn up. 

Do you often lie awake at night thinking about these creatures? Have you ever desired to own one, but are let down by their size? Well, this is the game for you! Step into the role of a scientist onboard the S.S. Tardiship and embark on your own intergalactic tardigrade adventure! You are expected to take care of an alien tardigrade. Your new pet will grow and evolve under careful care. Treat them well, and maybe tardigrades will become the next big thing! However, if you treat your tardigrade badly, you may end up with an unruly beast.

This game was originally made during the Indie Galactic Space Jam
